price: Hani o, babasına ve kavmine: "Kendilerine ibadet edip, durduğunuz bu putlar nedir?" demişti.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā hādhihi al-tamāthīlu allatī antum lahā ʿākifūna
